title: 9-foot ceilings with crown molding and fans, Oval tubs
posting_body: ['Provence at Valencia', '28160 McBean Parkway, Valencia, CA, 91354', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 46', 'OR Text', '46', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'An invitation to the sweet life', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 704 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Traditional yet modern.', 'Sophisticated yet casual.', 'Living here is sure to excite your senses and offer you an incredible retreat.', "Our one, two, and three bedroom apartments, located in the heart of Santa Clarita, provide you with all of the comfort you'll enjoy and all of the luxury you deserve.", 'Live Provence at Valencia and experience la dolce vita.', 'Features', '- Amenities and features subject to change.', '*', 'In select units.', '- Pass-through breakfast bars', '- Luxury plank flooring*', '- Linen closets', '- Oval tubs', '- Direct access garages*', '- Elegant architectural styling with stucco and stone', '- French doors*', '- Newly renovated units', '- Computer niche or lofts*', '- Covered patios or balconies', '- Microwaves', '- Oversized plant ledges', '- Full-size washers/dryers', '- 9-foot ceilings with crown molding and fans', '- Covered parking', 'Community Amenities', '- Playground', '- Beautiful clubroom with kitchen, fireplace, and cyber lounge', '- Fire pit in pool area', '- Resort-style swimming pool and spa', '- Package service', '- State-of-the-art fitness center', '- Wading pool', '- Courtesy patrol', '- Business center (Mac & PC computers)', '- Jogging, bike, and natural trails', '- Terrace attached to clubhouse', '- Cabana', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome!', '$500 deposit $50 a month for dogs $40 a month cats', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'eluz0ik1H']
